Text: Questionbyquestion boss grades now availableDue to overwhelming demand weve added new functionality to our Improve Your Boss assessment results In addition to your original grades by category you can now see how you did on a QUESTIONBYQUESTION basis We are providing this enhanced reporting free of charge To see this new information just login at assessmentsIYBossBossResults Your login is Your password is otg We hope you find this more detailed information beneficial Please let us know if you have other suggestions to make this tool more useful to you If you should care to repeat the assessment process you should be aware that we are now charging topdown users for each employee you invite to participate assessmentsiybossindexcfmactiontopdown In keeping with our vision however new assessments initiated bottomup by individual employees are still free On a final note we are also undertaking a limited number of custom development projects If youre interested in a customized employee opinion survey retention survey or degree feedback tool please visit our site and complete this short online inquiry form channelshrindexcfmactioncustomform Thank you James S Povec CEO ImproveNowcom
